title: BUG: (Minor) All invites appear to show as "Featured"
body:
Pretty much as a the title says. I think a little teensy weensy bug slipped through the cracks this cycle and EVERY game invite is shown in the invite slip as being for a Featured Game Mode.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body:
Yup, this is a bug we're aware of. It was pretty confusing the first time I received an invite today, since I know that *rotating game modes* hadn't been in the Beta Client in the past.

Thanks for posting this up!
